markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elven Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=14) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 40 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You favor bows and other elegant weapons. You are trained with [longbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=76), [composite longbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74), [longswords](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31), [rapiers](/Weapons.aspx?ID=36), [shortbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77), and [composite shortbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75).

 In addition, you gain access to all uncommon [elf](/Traits.aspx?ID=58) weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial elf weapons are simple weapons and advanced elf weapons are martial weapons.

<title level="2">Elven Weapon Familiarity leads to...</title>
[Elven Weapon Elegance](/Feats.aspx?ID=20), [Elven Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=24)
name: Elven Weapon Familiarity
